QuestData.Title: The Dead Watcher
QuestData.Description: A terrifying otherworldly being haunts both the spirit and physical worlds. We call it Shirrak.$B$BIt can only be harmed in your realm. Please help rid us of this nightmare.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Shirrak the Dead Watcher, then return to the Draenei Spirit.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps now we can finally be at peace.
